ru. 60 lakshayak wandi illa paudgalika ansha wishrama watup udghoshanayedi wedi wadi thuwala labu sewakayakugen shreshtadhikaranayata pethsamak sarath dharmasena pudgalika anshayata wishrama watup kramayak handunwa dimata erehiwa 2011.5.30 da udghoshana wyaparayak diyath kala katunayaka welenda kalapaye sewakayan saha polisiya athara athiwu gatumedi wedi wadi thuwala laba rohal gathawa prathikara labu sewakayek polisiyen rupiyal hatalakshayaka wandiyak ayakara dena lesa illa mulika ayithiwasikam pethsama shreshtadhikaranayata gonu kaleya.

sampur, santhosapuram pradeshayedi yathurupadiyakin gaman kala pasal guruwariyaka ghathanaya kara ran bhande kollakame siddhiyakata waradakaruwan wu dedenekuta thrikunamalaya mahadhikarana winisuru em, ilancheliyan mahatha marana daduwama niyama kaleya.melesa marana danduwama niyama kerune santhosapuram pradeshaye padinchi balasinham naguleshwar (awu.31) ha muthur, wenawur pradeshaye padinchi wijekumar chandrapala (awu.24) namaththantaya.santhosapuram pradeshayedi 2011 nowambar 27 wani dina ho eeta aasanna dinayakadi kuruwe sinham shri wadani (awu.33) namathi guruwariya wetha thiyunu saha mota aayudhayakin paharadi ghathanaya kara ran bhanda kollakame siddhiyak sambandhayen sakakaruwan hatharadayinaku athadanguwata gena mulika nadu wibhagaya muthur mahesthrath adhikaranaye wibhaga wiya.ema nadu wibhagayedi danda nithi sangrahaya 296 waganthiya anuwa maranaya sidukirim chodanawata nithipathi adhichodana gonu kirima pasuwa naduwa thrikunamalaya mahadhikaranayata yomukara thibuni.
